mapper.insert: INSERT INTO playlists (user_id, title, description, scope, music_keyword, image_path) VALUES (#{userId}, #{title}, #{description}, #{scope}, #{musicKeyword}, #{imagePath})
mapper.update: UPDATE playlists SET playlist_id=#{playlistId}, user_id=#{userId}, title=#{playlist.title}, description=#{playlist.description}, scope=#{playlist.scope}, music_keyword=#{playlist.musicKeyword}, image_path=#{playlist.imagePath} WHERE playlist_id=#{playlistId}
mapper.select: SELECT playlist_id, user_id, title, description, scope, created_at, music_keyword, image_path FROM playlists LIMIT 3
